name: @novicell/postcss-utils
description: We store the CSS packages in here.

scripts.build: npm run lint:fix && parcel build src/*.css --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-minify -d dist/src --no-cache
scripts.compile: npm run lint:fix && NODE_ENV=compile parcel build src/*.css --no-content-hash --no-minify --no-source-maps --no-cache
scripts.generate: npm run lint:fix && npm run build && npm run compile
